node.title: ‘There's a lot of hidden talent up here’: Clancy spots future Olympic talent in Far North Queensland
node.alt: A group of kids with three Australian Olympians Taliqua Clancy, Danny Morseu and Brad Hore
node.description: The Australian Olympic Committee has taken its search for future 2032 Brisbane Olympians to remote Far North Queensland, where they believe lies a pool of talented athletes.
node.content:
["Like many other Australians, Cathy Freeman's 2000 Olympic gold medal ignited a burning desire in Taliqua Clancy, to one day wear the same green and gold uniform.", "The now two-time beach volleyball Olympian hopes her achievements will inspire the next generation of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander kids to also dream of competing on the world's biggest sporting stage.\u00a0", "\"I just remember when I was a kid, and I sat and watch the 2000 Olympics, that was the reason why I'm in the position that I am today,\" the Tokyo silver medallist said.", "\"So I'm hoping\u00a0they watched us all compete, and I hope that's enough for them to just go out and, and be active and who knows, to even be a part of the 2032 Olympics\u00a0here in Queensland.\"", "Clancy joined former Olympians, basketballer\u00a0Danny Morseu and boxer Brad Hore, on a tour across Far North Queensland this week, as part of the Australian Olympic Committee's (AOC) 'Olympics Unleashed' program.\u00a0", "", "
The 'Olympics Unleashed'\u00a0program helps children in remote communities envisage\u00a0sporting\u00a0goals.\u00a0(Supplied: Australian Olympic Committee)
", "Visiting Thursday Island, Horn Island, Yarrabah\u00a0and Lockhart River along their travels,\u00a0Clancy said there\u00a0lies a pool of talented future athletes.", "Head of school at Horn Island primary campus, Tony Zieth, said\u00a0a visit from their heroes could\u00a0ignite an Olympic dream in young people.", "\"It allows a connection for the students to see a bridge that they need to travel to actually become an Olympian,\" he said.", "", "
More than 200 Australian Olympians have visited 1,600 schools across the country as part of the AOC\u2019s program.(Supplied: Australian Olympic Committee)
", "The Australian team that\u00a0travelled to Tokyo this year included the largest contingent of Indigenous athletes in Games history.", "Of the 472 athletes, 16 represented the First Nations people of Australia \u2014 a number the AOC hopes will continue to rise.", "\"It's those little things you plant in kids' minds at a very young age, that they can excel and achieve their dreams,\" said Morseu, who is on the AOC's Indigenous Advisory Committee.", "\"A\u00a0lot of the kids here are 14, 13 and 12 years old ... they're going to be in their prime by the time that 2032 Olympics come around in Brisbane.\"", "", "
Danny Morseu played in the\u00a0Australian men's basketball team\u00a0at the 1980 and 1984 Summer Olympic Games.(Supplied: Australian Olympic Committee)
", "The NBL\u00a0Hall-of-Famer is also running a free junior pathways program in the Torres Strait\u00a0as part of an Indigenous Basketball Australia initiative.", "\"It's about creating an\u00a0opportunity for our kids and getting them to think more globally,\" Morseu said.", "\"The objective of that program is to take our kids to the national championship in Australia and from there to the Asia Pacific Cup, then onto the World NBA Junior Global\u00a0Championship in Orlando, Florida.\""]
